A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After seeing the audience reviews I was \"iffy\" about this film. I'd definitely recommend watching before looking at reviews. The biggest flaw of the movie is Luke Skywalker. He did less than all of the characters and he's the polar opposite then when we last seen him in Return of the Jedi. The newer characters are the main focus (which I loved!) and we get more characters\, yet they seem unimportant... The standouts are (not in any order): Snoke\, Kylo Ren\, Rey\, Finn\, Poe and Rose.
